description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Fighter Mission: Air Superiority straps you into the seat of modern jetfighter. Dodge missiles, engage in dogfights against enemy jetfighters, strike at enemy ships or ground installations.   Fighter Mission: Air Superiority is a fun and fast top-down-shooter with a unique tactical approach. Get it now!  HD ready display required.
